channel.description: A world where everyone holds the power to employ science and creativity for good.

item.title: Hack your Home with the Royal Institution. 21st February

item.content:encoded:
Family Fun Day: Sparks will fly

The Royal Institution

Saturday, 21 February 2015 from 11:00 to 16:00 (GMT)

London, United Kingdom

A revolution is happening. Across the world people are taking control of the devices we use every day, customising them, creating new things and using the sparks of their imagination to change the world. Now it’s your turn, and you can start with the things you have around you.
 
TICKETS: http://www.rigb.org/whats-on/events-2015/february/public-family-fun-day-sparks-will-fly
